{{ organization }} WaterML 2 data access via WOFpy

WaterML 2 REST Service Request Examples

Note: WaterML 2 services are experimental, are currently not under active development, and have not undergone extensive testing. Use at your own risk!

Issue WaterML 2 GetValues sample requests for data and metadata from the {{ p }} data network using the service links below. XML responses will be returned, generated by the WOFpy server software.

OGC WaterML 2 is an encoding standard that incorporates elements of CUAHSI WaterML 1.x but is built on a different set of standards, including OGC GML and O&M. WaterML 2 responses are valid, but the standard is not fully implemented or widely tested. This is an experimental implementation. Known issues:

  • Fixed Metadata: QC Level: Raw Data
  • Fixed Metadata: Censor Code: Not Censored
  • No Value Metadata (Method Code, etc)
  • Unit of Measure may not be fully to best practice (using what is in ODM/dao model)
  • interpolationType title is from ODM/dao model, but referenece is fixed to xlink:href="http://www.opengis.net/def/timeseriesType/WaterML/2.0/Discontinuous"
